ETLComponent.name: WebServiceClient
ETLComponent.description: Send incoming data record to a web-service and the response is passed on output ports.

ETLComponent.name: ComplexDataReader
ETLComponent.description: Reads non-homogeneous data from files containing multiple metadata.

property.name: selectorClass
property.defaultHint: custom code if available, prefix selector otherwise

ETLComponent.name: SpreadsheetDataReader
ETLComponent.description: Reads specified sheets of Excel files, converts their contents to data records and sends them to connected output port. Mapping of sheet content to output metadata must be defined.

property.displayName: Number of skipped records per source
property.name: skipSourceRecords

property.displayName: Max number of records per source
property.name: numSourceRecords

property.displayName: Number of skipped records per spreadsheet
property.name: skipSheetRecords

property.displayName: Max number of records per spreadsheet
property.name: numSheetRecords

ETLComponent.name: SpreadsheetDataWriter
ETLComponent.description: Writes into specified sheets of Excel files. Mapping of input metadata to sheet content must be defined.

item.displayValue: Do nothing, keep existing sheets and data

ETLComponent.name: JavaBeanReader
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from Java beans, converts properties matched by XPath defined in mapping along with their direct children to data records and sends them into different connected output ports as defined by mapping.

ETLComponent.name: JavaBeanWriter
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through all connected input ports, converts data records to Java Bean properties based on defined mapping.

ETLComponent.name: JavaMapWriter
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through all connected input ports, converts data records to Maps based on defined mapping and writes the resulting tree structure of elements to Maps.

ETLComponent.name: JSONReader
ETLComponent.description: Reads data from JSON, converts properties matched by XPath defined in mapping along with their direct children to data records and sends them into different connected output ports as defined by mapping.

ETLComponent.name: JSONWriter
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through all connected input ports, converts data records to JSON objects based on defined mapping and writes the resulting tree structure of elements to JSON files.

ETLComponent.name: ExecuteGraph
ETLComponent.description: The component ExecuteGraph allows running subgraphs with user-specified settings and provides their results and tracking information to output ports.

ETLComponent.name: ExecuteScript
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Runs either shell scripts or scripts interpreted by a selected interpreter.
ETLComponent.description: SystemExecute is a component that runs either shell scripts or scripts interpreted by a selected interpreter. It either runs a script only once or the script is executed repeatedly for each incoming record. Each incoming record can redefine almost all parameters of run including the script itself.

ETLComponent.name: ExecuteJobflow
ETLComponent.description: The component ExecuteJobflow allows running jobflows with user-specified settings and provides their results and tracking information to output ports.

ETLComponent.name: MonitorGraph
ETLComponent.description: The component MonitorGraph allows watching running graphs. Component can either wait for final execution status or periodically monitor current execution status.

ETLComponent.name: MonitorJobflow
ETLComponent.description: The component MonitorJobflow allows watching running jobflows. Component can either wait for final execution status or periodically monitor current execution status.

ETLComponent.name: KillGraph
ETLComponent.description: The KillGraph component aborts specified graphs and passes their final status to output port.

ETLComponent.name: KillJobflow
ETLComponent.description: The KillJobflow component aborts specified jobflows and passes their final status to output port.

ETLComponent.name: GetJobInput
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Produces single record populated by dictionary content.
ETLComponent.description: The component GetJobInput produces single record populated by dictionary content and/or graph parameters.

ETLComponent.name: SetJobOutput
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Sets incoming values to dictionary content.
ETLComponent.description: The component SetJobOutput receives input records and sets the incoming values to dictionary content.

ETLComponent.name: Fail
ETLComponent.description: The component Fail aborts the parent job (jobflow or graph) with user-specified error message.

ETLComponent.name: TokenGather
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Copies incoming tokens from any input port to all output ports.
ETLComponent.description: The component TokenGather copies each incoming token from any input port to all connected output ports. If input metadata differs from output metadata copying based on field names is used. This component is typically used to collect all tokens from several parallel execution branches and send them to one unified output.

ETLComponent.name: Barrier
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Waits for results of parallel running jobs and sends an aggregated result to output port.
ETLComponent.description: The component Barrier allows to wait for results of parallel running jobs and react to the success or failure of groups of jobs in a simple way. Barrier waits for all input tokens belonging to a group, evaluates this group and based on the results sends output token(s) to first or second output port.

property.name: chunkPartitioner
property.defaultHint: Tuple (New group created when all inputs receive a token)

item.displayValue: Tuple (New group created when all inputs receive a token)

ETLComponent.name: Success
ETLComponent.description: The Success component indicates successful termination of tokens.

ETLComponent.name: Condition
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Routes incoming tokens to one of its output ports.
ETLComponent.description: The Condition component routes incoming tokens to one of its output ports based on result of specified condition. It is similar to 'if' statement in programming languages.

ETLComponent.name: Combine
ETLComponent.description: The component Combine takes single records from each input port and combines them to single output record according to specified transformation.

ETLComponent.name: CreateFiles
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Creates files and directories, sets last modification date.
ETLComponent.description: Creates files and directories or sets the last modified date.

ETLComponent.name: DeleteFiles
ETLComponent.description: Deletes files and directories.

ETLComponent.name: ListFiles
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Lists directory contents, retrieves file attributes.
ETLComponent.description: Lists directory contents and reads file attributes, such as size or last modification data.

ETLComponent.name: CopyFiles
ETLComponent.description: Copies files and directories. Subdirectories may be copied recursively.

ETLComponent.name: MoveFiles
ETLComponent.description: Moves files and directories.

ETLComponent.name: ClusterSimpleGather
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Gathers data flows from cluster nodes.
ETLComponent.description: Receives gather data through all cluster nodes. Gets all incoming records and sends them to connected output port. Terminates when all incoming records are received and sent to connected output port.

ETLComponent.name: ClusterMerge
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Merges data flows from cluster nodes.
ETLComponent.description: Receives sorted data through all connected cluster nodes. Gets all incoming records and sends them to connected output port sorted in the same way. Terminates when all incoming records are received and sent to connected output port.

ETLComponent.name: ClusterPartition
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Splits incoming data flow on cluster nodes.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, splits incoming data flow into more flows and sends each of them to different cluster node.

ETLComponent.name: LoadBalancingPartition
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Splits incoming data flow to available output ports.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, splits incoming data flow into more flows to ensure all output ports are balanced employed.

ETLComponent.name: ClusterLoadBalancingPartition
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Splits incoming data flow on cluster nodes.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port, splits incoming data flow into more flows and sends each of them to different cluster node.

ETLComponent.name: ClusterRepartition
ETLComponent.description: Receives partitioned data through connected input port and repartitions them according different rules.

ETLComponent.name: ClusterSimpleCopy
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Copies data records to all output workers.
ETLComponent.description: Receives data through connected input port and copies data records to all cluster workers. Each incoming record is sent to all output partitions.

ETLComponent.name: ExecuteMapReduce
ETLComponent.shortDescription: Executes map/reduce jobs on Hadoop cluster.
ETLComponent.description: Jobs are specified as .jar libraries containing at least mapper class, (most of the times) reducer class and input & output location on cluster's file system. Libraries with mapper & reducer are send to cluster together with other settings and executed.

property.displayName: URL of JAR file with job classes
property.name: jarLocation
numMappers
property.defaultHint: Number of map tasks hint (Input format class decides)

property.name: numReducers
property.defaultHint: Required number of reduce tasks (if zero, mapper output goes directly to Output directory)
